## Summary

A concise description of the feature or improvement.

## Motivation

Why is this feature useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

How should this work? Include CLI flags, API changes, or strategy descriptions as applicable.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you've thought about and why they were not chosen.

## Additional Context

Links to related issues, references, or examples from other tools.
